ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: I got levitate at 14 (as a troll shaman) last night.  It lasts quite a while really (5 minutes or so?) and will last longer as I go up in levels I believe.
ygData.messageBody:
I got levitate at 14 (as a troll shaman) last night. It lasts quite a while
really (5 minutes or so?) and will last longer as I go up in levels I
believe. It's very fun to pick the tallest thing you can find, climb it,
and zoom out across the zone way up. You gently drift down. One word of
warning though, you need a bat wing for each cast. So, a troll was sighted
outside freeport last night killing bats in one hit with his combine morning
star - hehe.

Now I love going around and casting SoW and levitate on friendly strangers.

good luck,
Darmok the troll
Azara the enchantress

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Murawski [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 9:16 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Fear and level 16 spell questions.


From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>

I just started using fear yesterday just for the heck of it.
I'm always fighting stuff that trains and so I'm paranoid that I'll cause a
huge train while romping around
the area stabbing the fleeing mob in the back.

So the question is
Suppose I fear a wisp and I have a pet. If I just stand where I am and not
follow, will my pet following the wisp cause a train if wisps are in the
area?

Also, since I'm getting close to level 16, I might as well start pouring on
the questions

Does levitate last long?

I've heard that quickness doesn't last long and I notice that it has a high
mana requirement. What level is it
mana efficient to use at? (eq similar to chaotic feedback, at lv 8, it
isn't so mana efficient)

I think I've seen it before, but I can't remember. Rune I uses a component
right? What is it?

Thanks

Azboklin the enchanter
